title: Financial Disclosure Reports Now Available | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




April 03, 2009

 



Financial Disclosure Reports Now Available





Financial Disclosure Reports Now Available

SF 278 Executive Branch Personnel Public Financial Disclosure reports for White House officials are now available.  For the first time, reporters and interested parties will be able to request online those reports they would like to review.  We have also streamlined the distribution process, so that each report is available in .pdf form for quick transmission via email.  By filling out this electronic form, you can access the reports of the officials you wish to review.  Requested reports will be emailed as quickly as possible - please call the press office if you experience a delay.

The application form to access the SF 278s is available in Disclosure section.
